bow: traveling alone with baby and have to pee okay how what do other moms do my daughter is months old and we are going on hour road trip here in couple weeks typically if we are just out and about hugely appreciated little nervous update the drive down went great she got little fussy and then of course got lost who gets lost with gps me but we made it and today we are going to the zoo wear my son on my back to use the bathroom it usually works out better than front carry usually pay at the pump so leave him in his seat for that if it long trip he likes to get out of the car for bit you ll do fine just take as much time as you can need when we re out my boy is in convertible now also just bring him in the stall and stand him up against my knees while pee maybe little gross but eh do the
